attributes.review: Please get this off of the app store. I don’t want to catch a virus on my phone. I’ve heard that the owner of this app spreads racism, xenophobia, sexism, and homophobia😬Uh ohhhh sounds dangerous. MUST BE TAKEN DOWN⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️❌❌❌❌❌❌WARNING WARNING WARNING🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: Just No. Please NO.
